pages.text: This butterfly can only be found in the $(#f5d016)meadows$(). In nature, this type of butterfly $(#f5d016)can be milked for jelly.$() A player can lure the cloudypuff towards them by placing a $(#f5d016)campfire$(). When put into a bottle, the cloudypuff will make $(#f5d016)clouds.$()
pages.title: Cloudypuff

pages.wings_caption: The wings of the Cloudypuff can be used to replace $(#f5d016)ghast tears$() in crafting recipes
pages.butterfly_caption: Nectar collected by this butterfly reacts to form jelly, which causes the occasional clouds.
